item.title: Ori add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: "Penderitaan yang sesungguhnya adalah ketika kamu kehilangan kepercayaan diri dan harapan. Ketika Allah tak ada dalam tujuan hidupmu " -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: Ori add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Ori add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ori add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Ori add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Ori add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Ori add a quote by Asma Nadia
item.description: "Jika cinta bisa membuat seorang perempuan setia pada satu lelaki, kenapa cinta tidak bisa membuat lelaki bertahan dengan satu perempuan?" -- Asma Nadia

item.title: Ori add a quote by Asma Nadia
item.description: "Kematian, adalah peristiwa tercepat, yang menjadikan segala tinggal sejarah." -- Asma Nadia

item.title: Ori add a quote by Confucius
item.description: "If you make a mistake and do not correct it, this is called a mistake." -- Confucius

item.title: Ori add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Ori add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Ori add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Ori add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "We're all human, aren't we? Every human life is worth the same, and worth saving." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Ori add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "The truth." Dumbledore sighed. "It is a beautiful and terrible thing, and should therefore be treated with great caution." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Ori add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Buku yang kubaca selalu memberi sayap-sayap baru. Membawaku terbang ke taman-taman pengetahuan paling menawan, melintasi waktu dan peristiwa, berbagi cerita cinta, menyapa semua tokoh yang ingin kujumpai, sambil bermain di lengkung pelangi." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Ori add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Buku adalah sahabat paling setia rela mendampingi sepanjang waktu di mana pun aku berada tanpa pernah memikirkan dirinya." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Ori add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: " Harry Potter, Sudahkah kau temukan ramuan rahasia itu agar seluruh orang di dunia bisa saling cinta?" -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Ori add a quote by Helvy Tiana Rosa
item.description: "Cinta yang suci menempatkan ukuran fisik hanya di nomor 10 dari 10 kriteria" -- Helvy Tiana Rosa

item.title: Ori add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Ori add a quote by Ikram Abidi
item.description: "Sebagian orang berharap dapat menikah dengan laki-laki yang mereka cintai. Doaku sedikit berbeda: Aku dengan rendah hati memohon kepada Tuhan agar aku mencintai laki-laki yang aku nikahi." -- Ikram Abidi
